name: Panda Baby Nappy Wash Liquid
description: Panda Baby nappy wash is extra gentle on your little one’s delicate fabrics and has no harmful effect on baby’s sensitive skin. This advanced formula removes stains and keeps whites whiter and colours brighter. The refreshing fragrance of this nappy wash leaves your baby’s clothes smelling fresh and clean. Suitable for nappies, children’s clothing, delicate fabrics and soft toys. Safe for washing machines and gentle enough for washing by hand. *Images for illustration purposes only. Product received may vary.
